headline.suffix: that makes complex things feel simple.

spotify.disclaimer: Not affiliated with Spotify. Album art and song previews are from Deezer.

origin.title: Where I'm From
origin.body: I was born and raised in the Netherlands. My dad and mom both worked hard to give me and my brother the space to figure things out on our own. I spent way too many hours behind a computer screen as a kid, tinkering with code and games which in hindsight turned out to be a pretty good investment of time.

past.title: What I Used to Do
past.body: My first jobs weren’t glamorous, I stocked shelves and tried out a few things that taught me more about people. Eventually, I leaned into tech building small projects, doing side gigs, and exploring how software could make life (and work) simpler.

present.title: What I Do Now
present.body: Today, I'm a mid-level software engineer working at <dictu>@DICTU</dictu>. On the side, I like to experiment with new libraries, tools, and building out ideas. I like working where code meets people, making tools that don’t just ‘run’ but make someone’s day easier.

life.title: Where I'm At Now
life.body: I live in Gouda, balancing work, hobbies, and side projects. When I’m not coding, you’ll usually find me at the gym (or trying to convince myself to go), or hanging out with friends and family.

future.title: What I'm Looking For
future.body: Opportunities to create impactful products with talented teams. I believe in using tech to cut through complexity, not add to it.

stack.title: Stack
stack.description: I like to keep things modern but practical. Here's my current stack.

dictu.alt: The logo of Dienst ICT Uitvoering

softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description: Engineering the next iteration of a nationwide agricultural compliance portal for a Dutch government agency: focusing modularity, accessibility, and long-term maintainability.

softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description: Served as a software engineer across hospital and international organization projects, working on feature delivery and integrations implementation.

juniorDrupalDeveloperPartTime.title: Junior Drupal developer
juniorDrupalDeveloperPartTime.description: Working as drupal developer on several projects for a different set of clients including local municipalities, hospitals, non-profits, and for international organizations.

juniorDrupalDeveloperInternship.title: Junior Drupal developer
juniorDrupalDeveloperInternship.description: Learned the fundamentals of Drupal development, supporting more senior developers on customer projects. Worked with other engineers while shipping Drupal features, tuning performance, and learning deployment practices.
